description:
Versatile, everyday insulation with a dose of alpine inspiration, the Helix Jacket combines sustainable materials with a technical crossover design that sheds light precipitation. Zoned, quilted panels of 70gm MerinoLoft™ insulation bring warmth to key areas while merino terry side panels regulate body temperature on warmer days. The snug-fitting, insulated hood provides added protection, while zippered hand pockets keep small essentials close at hand.

Three layers of comfort in a lightweight layer, icebreaker MerinoLoft™ has a durable, water-repellent shell filled with natural merino-fiber batting, with a super-soft lining in 100% merino. Inspired by nature, icebreaker harnesses the performance qualities of natural fibers to offer an alternative to clothing based on petrochemical synthetics.
name: Icebreaker Helix Jacket - Mens
